version_description: User experience and performance improvements
User experience and performance improvements
User experience and performance improvements
Bug fixes and security improvements
Bug fixes and security improvements.

In this release, you can expect:
- Improvements in the document capture feature. We more clearly explain how to take picture of a document in the resolution center.
- To help in quickly identifying which version of the Remitly app you have installed, we now surface the version in the app. This can help when troubleshooting with our customer service agents
- No extra fee for Elektra cash pickup in Mexico. Only $3.99.
- General improvements to the app
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Thanks for being a Remitly customer! This release contains:
-An improvement for UK customers paying with their bank account. We now show you the bank payment instructions immediately after submitting a transfer, cutting down the number of screens so you can fulfill your transfer faster.
-General improvements and bug fixings
Starting today we’re gradually launching a brand new user experience for sending money back home. We hope you enjoy the new and improved Remitly experience.
You can now store your remitly.com username and password in Safari (iCloud Keychain) for easier sign in next time. No need to remember your password anymore!
You can now store your remitly.com username and password in Safari (iCloud Keychain) for easier sign in next time. No need to remember your password anymore!
You can now send money from Australia to India and Philippines in minutes! Sign up and send within minutes and get a special offer on your first transfer (minimum send amounts may apply).

We have been busy adding new countries you can send money to! You can now send money to Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Chile, Costa Rica, Paraguay, Uruguay, Nigeria.

We are always busy at work making the app better for you! In this update, find all your transfers neatly organized. You can also start sending money to Panama, South Africa, Ethiopia & Kenya.

You can now send money to Jamaica and Uganda!

We are excited to bring a whole new app design to you! We gave our app a facelift, making it easier than ever to use.
- On the new Home screen, you’ll now find transfer status information and can easily start a new transfer.
- From the Recipients tab, you can quickly access recipient information as well as send money.
- In the My Remitly tab, you’ll find your profile information and preferences.

Need additional help? Reach out to us anytime at help.remitly.com.
